title: My Idea for a ap assassin jungler
body:
So, I was thinking for awhile now, would it be cool if there was a rabbit like yordle, well I definitely do. So after a while of thinking, here is what I've got.

P.S, if you are a Riot employee, please consider showing this to the champion design team, I would LOVE it if this was in-game and I would main it hard.

Name: Vuur. Alias: The Rabbit Of Fire. Role: assassin. Damage type: magic. Difficulty: 2. Damage: 3. Defence: 2. Crowd control: 2. Mobility: 3. Utility: 1.

Base Stats: Health: 570 (83 per lvl)
Mana: 399 (75 per lvl)
AD: 59 (2.3 per lvl)
Attack speed: 0.683 (3.5% per lvl) 
AP: 0 (0 per lvl)
Armour: 31 (2.1 per lvl)
Magic Resist: 31 (1.3 per lvl)
Movement speed: 345 (0 per lvl)
Range: 150 (0 per lvl)

Abilities:

Passive: Explosive flame. 
Vuur's basic attacks deal 5/10/15/20/25/30/35/40/45/50 (based on lvl) (+ 10% AP) bonus on-hit magic damage, and burn the target for 4 seconds, dealing 4/10/14/16/20/15/21/29/37/50 (based on lvl) (+ 5% AP) per second. The timer can stack up to 5 times.

Whenever Vuur basic attacks, all enemies within 550 units of his target have on hit effects applied to them.

At lvl 10, Vuur's range is increased to 525.

Q: Infernal Dash
Cost: 60/65/70/75/80 mana
Range: 1070
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8

Vuur throws a fireball that deals 60/90/120/150/180 (+ 40% AP) magic damage, leaving a marker at the end of the ability. If recast within 1.75 seconds, he teleports to the marker, dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+ 35% AP) magic damage in an area, he also gains 20/30/40/50/60% attack speed for 7 seconds

W: Infernal Rupture
Cost: 80/90/100/105/110 mana
Range: 1100
Cooldown: 15/13/12/10/8

Vuur summons fire in an area, dealing 80/120/130/160/200 (+ 55% AP) magic damage, and slowing enemies by 50% for 1.5 seconds. All enemies who have any burn stacks on them are stunned instead. Monsters hit take 25% bonus magic damage.

E: Outta the way, they're MINE.
Cost: 100 mana
Range: 1550
Cooldown: 20/17/15/12/9

Vuur thrusts his sword, dealing 70/80/90/120/140 (+ 55% AP) magic damage, knocking enemies aside who are within 1300 units of him, reducing their armour by 20% AP and their magic resist by 10% AP for 3 seconds, and slowing them by 25% for 5 seconds. He roots the first enemy champion hit within 1301 and 1550 units of him for 1.5 seconds and dashes to them. However, if there are no enemy champions within 1301 and 1550 units of him, he dashes to the first enemy hit within the whole range.

R:  Fireball of absolute magnitude and destruction
Cost: 100 mana
Range: 8000
Cooldown: 120/100/80

Vuur summons a massive fireball in the sky, after a 0.75 second delay, he sends it crashing down, dealing 200/300/400 (+ 60% AP), if recast within 2 seconds, he teleports to the center of the impact zone, gaining 20/30/40% bonus movement and attack speed, 10/30/50 bonus magic resist and 20/35/50 bonus armour for 10 seconds.

Thanks for reading!
